text: nowpel del banda anakneasar ban mokadl puokke(krom a d ning sa mou d) teang moun puokke ning kraoy puokke( daoy ban pol tha) chaur puok anak kom korp sakkar phe sa ng pi a l laoh aoy saoh . puokke ban tb vinh tha brasenbae mcheasa robsa puok yeung mean chetnea trong pitchea banhchouh mea la ai kat( thveuchea anakneasar) . dau che neah pit brakd nasa puok yeung kmean chomnue nung avei delke ban banhchoun vea mk aoy puok anak noh laey
